20: I tried to run yesterday but I couldn’t run for more than a minute. Is that a bad sign?
The other kids at school have been making fun of my belly. I’m going to get fit and show them!
All the other boys in my school are so thin and can run so much. I really need to get in shape.
40: I like this girl but she called me ‘chubby’ the other day. Maybe if I loose weight she’ll like me?
I think I’m beginning to like sports class. Maybe I should work out more
I’m making a resolution diary, no more soda drinks for 2 months.
60: I think I can see my first ab. Go me! It’s weird but I’m really enjoying this feeling.
A jog a day keeps the doctor away.
My dad just bought me some cool new running shoes today. I’m going to give them a spin tomorrow.
80: So I saw this sign for a 5K race outside school today. I think I’m going to sign up for that.
The gym coach at school saw me playing football today and asked me to be on the team. I’m so excited!
Work hard. Play hard and run 5K everyday. That’s my mantra.
100: I’ve been killing it at football at school. This could be a career for be, maybe?
Training for longer and better hours is all I need to improve my game. I think I could take my school to the finals!
We just won the last game in the last two minutes. I’m going to train so hard, we defeat them next time!

20: I think I’m going to fail all my subjects this year. I better pull my socks up.
All my grades were Cs and Ds. I’m in so much trouble
I just got the news that if I don’t pass my next exam, I might fail
40: I guess a C is better than a D. Mum and dad are still very angry with me.
I’m just barely passing school this year. If I don’t do better, my mums going to kill me!
I just passed school riding the ‘C grade’ train.
60: Yay! Finally a B! Maybe mum will be less angry this time?
No matter how hard i try, there is always still some homework that I need to do.
I have to get good marks this year, or mum is going to be so mad at me!
80: So I’ve gotten a few A’s this year which is good but I wasn’t top of my class.
Ranked 10th in class this year. Maybe for next year I’ll change the double digits to single digits!
Goal for next year, to win the student award. I’m going to start preparing from now.
100: Did you know I missed the student of the year award because of 10 marks? Can’t let that happen again!
If I can win the student award, I can get a scholarship for college. Time to prep!
I hate coming in second in school. If I just try a little harder, I can do it!

20: You know diary, I don’t like going out and meeting people. Mum’s been nagging me about it
Mum asked me if I wanted to have a birthday party. What’s the point? I don’t have any friends anyways.
I enjoy the company of my books, not humans. Can’t get mum to listen to me, maybe I should listen to her?
40: I’m scared of going to school camp because I don’t know who will want to share their tent with me?
I don’t know how to play football. Maybe the kids in the park can teach me.
I hate sitting and eating my lunch alone. But making new friends is so hard!
60: OMG I haven’t seen my friends in like a whole week. Need to catch up with them very soon.
Samir told me so much gossip today. I’ve been missing out, I need to catch up with them!
My entire life is full of FOMO. I need some friend time, stat!
80: We went bowling and I had such a fun weekend with my friends. Time to plan the next weekend.
I’m having some serious FOMO right now. Samir had a party this weekend and I couldn’t make it. Never again, diary, never again!
I think I want to have a birthday party this year. I’m going to invite everyone and it’s going to lit!
100: Got myself some cool backstage tickets to Coldplay. Gotta keep my social quota up and I’ll ring in some more free stuff!
I do have an exam coming up BUT I also have a very important party which I just cannot miss.
